mapper.select: SELECT bi.image_name, b.book_title, b.book_price, od.order_count, (b.book_price * od.order_count) AS total_price,od.order_status FROM order_details od JOIN book b ON od.bno = b.bno JOIN orders o on o.ono=od.ono JOIN book_image bi ON bi.bno = b.bno WHERE o.member_id = #{memberId} and od.odno=#{odno}
